Please read the additional data fields descriptions before entering information into this template. Completed templates must be returned to your organisation's main, parent or sponsoring department. They will provide one return to Cabinet Office capturing information for all their relevant organisations.
(NB: This data sheet is password protected. Contact Cabinet Office if you require the password.

column3: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
column41: Fixed term appointed staff on Defra payroll have been incorrectly included within contingent labour costs up to April 2021.  These have been removed from May 2021 onwards as these costs are already included within Core Defra payroll figure for Workforce Management Information, resulting in over-reporting of total costs

column3: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
column42: No accounts produced for Apr21 on contingent labour resulting in -£99k however APHA will resume producing accounts in May so the May21 position will be correct.
